programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Action comedy thriller starring Martin Lawrence and Will Smith. Two chalk-and-cheese Miami drugs squad detectives - one a wise-cracking, Porsche-driving ladies' man, the other married with a family - are assigned to track down a missing $100-million shipment of heroin Michael Bay - Director Martin Lawrence - Marcus Burnett Will Smith - Mike Lowrey Téa Leoni - Julie Mott Tcheky Karyo - Fouchet Theresa Randle - Theresa Burnett Marg Helgenberger - Alison Sinclair Nestor Serrano - Detective Sanchez Julio Oscar Mechoso - Detective Ruiz Saverio Guerra - Chet the doorman.

programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. Comedy, starring Conan O'Brien, Martin Herlihy, John Higgins and Ben Marshall, narrated by John Goodman Paul Briganti - Director Martin Herlihy - Martin John Higgins - John Ben Marshall - Ben Conan O'Brien - Farley X Mayo - Taylor Megan Stalter - Megan.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Feb 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. At the funeral for an old friend, Claire approaches the deceased's widower and states that she intends to murder him in revenge for something terrible he did decades ago. Claire then reconnects with her estranged college pal, Evelyn, who agrees to help out - if only to see if Claire really follows through.. Paul Weitz - Director Jane Fonda - Claire Lily Tomlin - Evelyn Malcolm McDowell - Howard Richard Roundtree - Ralph Sarah Burns - Allie Catherine Dent - Molly.

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Residents of a small Pennsylvania town are disturbed when a UFO crashes into a back garden. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: Arcadian
programme.sub-title: Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action horror starring Nicolas Cage. Following an apocalyptic event, single father Paul lives with his two teenage sons on an isolated homestead, forced to hide every night from the nocturnal monsters that stalk the outdoors. Though the trio has settled into a relatively stable routine, their lives are threatened when the creatures start working out how to get inside.. programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke and Mark Rylance. In 2045, society's main entertainment is an ultra-immersive virtual reality simulation called the "OASIS". programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: Psychological horror drama starring Justice Smith and Brigette Lundy-Paine. programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: Psychological horror drama starring Justice Smith and Brigette Lundy-Paine. As a child, Owen is isolated and awkward, but he finds a friend in fellow outcast Maddy, who introduces him to her favourite TV show: The Pink Opaque. This dark and sometimes troubling fantasy series exerts a strange pull on the pair, and the boundary between reality and the world of the show soon appears to blur Jane Schoenbrun - Director Justice Smith - Owen Jack Haven - Maddy Ian Foreman - Young Owen Helena Howard - Isabel Lindsey Jordan - Tara Danielle Deadwyler - Brenda Fred Durst - Frank Conner O'Malley - Dave Emma Portner - Mr Melancholy / Marco / Amanda / Evil Clown.

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: At a girls' middle school plagued by bullying, a student's tragic death leads to a wave of disappearances. Thriller, starring Eric Wang and Ning Chang. programme.desc: United Archives 5/4/93. United travelled to Carrow Road for a crunch match against title rivals Norwich.

programme.title: PL: Manchester City v United 93/94
programme.desc: United Archives 7/11/93. This derby clash proved to be the archetypal game of two halves, thankfully it ended in three points for the Reds.

programme.title: FAC: Wimbledon v United 93/94
programme.desc: United Archives 20/2/94. United make light work of Wimbledon in this fifth round FA Cup tie.

programme.title: 1994 FA Cup Final: v Chelsea
programme.desc: United Archives 14/5/94. United were aiming to become the fourth club in the 20th Century to complete The Double & for the first time in the club's history as they took on Chelsea in the FA Cup final.

programme.title: PL: United v Man City 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 10/11/94. A classic derby encounter as Brian Horton brought his team across the city to Old Trafford.

programme.desc: United legend Eric Cantona reflects on his iconic career with Andrew Mensah, as the mercurial Frenchman takes a look at some of his favourite classic kits with BT Sport.

programme.title: Blackburn v United 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 24/10/94. Alex Ferguson and Kenny Dalglish went head-to-head at Ewood Park with both sides looking to lay down a marker as title contenders.

programme.title: 1996 FA Cup Final: v Liverpool
programme.desc: United Archives 11/5/96. United were aiming to become the first club to win the FA Cup 9 times in this final against Liverpool and also win the League and Cup double on two occasions.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 4/3/96. A huge game in the 1995/96 title race as Eric Cantona's winner cut Newcastle's lead over United to just one point with the end of the season looming.

programme.title: PL: United v Sunderland 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/96. United took on Sunderland for the first time in the Premier League on what was to be a memorable afternoon at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: Leeds v United 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 7/9/96. Eric Cantona is in the United line up and returns to his former club as the Reds take on Leeds.

programme.desc: An exclusive, extended interview from 2013 with United legend Eric Cantona, presented by French film director and broadcaster Antoine de Caunes.

programme.title: La Philosophie de Cantona: The Art of Rebellion
programme.desc: Over 20 years since signing for United, this documentary examines Cantona's personal philosophies. With exclusive contributions from Eric's family.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Cantona
programme.desc: The King talks to the Pod about his famous 'seagulls following the trawler' press conference, his unique celebration against Sunderland and the meaning of life.

programme.title: What I Wore: Eric Cantona
programme.desc: United legend Eric Cantona reflects on his iconic career with Andrew Mensah, as the mercurial Frenchman takes a look at some of his favourite classic kits with BT Sport.

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 92/93
programme.desc: United Archives 9/1/93. After a 5-0 home win in their last league game, the Reds were on a roll when they welcomed Spurs to Old Trafford.

programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/00. United welcomed struggling Southampton looking to keep up their scintillating home form, having scored 22 goals in their opening six league contests at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.desc: In Quebec City, Callum Smith stands across the ring from Artur Beterbiev as the Liverpudlian attempts to topple the unified light heavyweight champion of the world. (13.01).

programme.title: Toney v Jones Jr I 1994
programme.desc: In 1994 at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Nevada, Roy Jones Jr challenged James Toney for the IBF super middleweight championship.

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: Out to retain the League Leaders' Shield, Wigan host Salford for the final regular round of the Super League. 80 minutes stand between the Warriors and another Old Trafford outing. (17.09).

programme.title: NBC's Pro-Football Talk
programme.desc: Mike Florio and Chris Simms present this NFL talk show, as they discuss and debate the biggest stories from around the league.

programme.title: LIVE: S/Lge: Hull FC V Leigh
programme.desc: Hull FC play host to Leigh Leopards in the Betfred Super League. (06.03).

programme.title: Girlz Are Playaz Too
programme.desc: Priscilla Anyabu explores what it's like for everyday women to participate in boxing. She trains with beginners and up to the professionals. Part of the Sky Sports New Focus Fund.

programme.title: S/Lge
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Hull FC host Hull KR at the MKM Stadium during round one. This season, Hull FC are looking to emulate the Robins who enjoyed a successful 2023 campaign. (15.02).

programme.title: Gloves Are Off: Jonas v Price
programme.desc: British rivals Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price come face to face for a verbal confrontation ahead of their blockbuster world-title unification bout at Royal Albert Hall on Friday 7 March.

programme.title: LIVE: NCAA Basketball
programme.desc: A women's NCAA college basketball clash between the Duke Blue Devils and North Carolina Tar Heels at the Cameron Indoor Stadium. (27.02).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, St Helens play host to a Warrington Wolves side riding a three-game winning streak. The Saints fell away from home to league leaders last week. (19.07).

programme.title: Fight Night
programme.desc: Denys Berinchyk puts his WBO world lightweight title on the line for the first time, as unbeaten American star Keyshawn Davis challenges the Ukrainian in New York. (15.02).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: Huddersfield Giants take on Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. Luke Robinson guided his Giants team to victory for the first time as interim coach, overcoming Salford 16-8. (25.07).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: Wigan Warriors host Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. The leaders and reigning champions Wigan were stunned by Hull FC in round 18, losing at the MKM Stadium. (26.07).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: The new league leaders Warrington Wolves host Hull KR in the Betfred Super League. Sam Burgess' Wolves emerged victorious in last week's colossal clash, defeating rivals Wigan. (02.08).

programme.title: NFL: KC Chiefs
programme.desc: The Niners and the Chiefs run it back with a regular season rematch of Super Bowl LVIII. The Chiefs remain perfect after five played, while Brock Purdy's 3-3 49ers have work to do. (20.10).

programme.title: NFL: D Lions
programme.desc: A match-up during week nine of the NFL, as the NFC North's top two Green Bay and Detroit go toe to toe at Lambeau Field. Green Bay's only division game so far ended in defeat. (03.11).
